game.title: Lost City Expedition
game.objective: Explore the lost city and retrieve an ancient artifact.
game.description: The city is said to be hidden deep within the jungle, and many have attempted to find it but never returned. Your skills as a treasure hunter are needed to uncover its secrets.

task.objective: Find the entrance to the lost city.
task.description: The entrance is said to be hidden behind a waterfall. You'll need to navigate through the dense jungle and avoid deadly traps.
The ruins are said to be filled with puzzles and riddles. You'll need to use your wits to unlock the doors and continue on your journey.
The artifact is said to be hidden in a temple deep within the city. You'll need to fight off fierce beasts and avoid deadly traps to reach it.
